data.content:
Handoff capsule (2026-02-21, commit b2f327b):
- Added two new README feature sections: Agent History and ReTake, each with descriptive copy and embedded screenshots.
- Updated the top README thumbnail table to include Agent History and ReTake tiles with the existing screenshot thumbnails.
- Added optimized screenshot assets at docs/screenshots/agent-history.png and docs/screenshots/retake.png.
- Resized both new screenshots to 1024px width to match existing screenshot sizing conventions.
- Pushed directly to origin/main (080f716 -> b2f327b).
- Verification: no code-path changes; tests/lint/build not run for docs+image-only update.
